attributes.action: Remove the tolls at the Dartford Crossing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government claim that they want to reduce congestion at the Dartford Crossing (both ways), if they removed the toll charge, as the bridge has alredy been paid for, there would be no need for the toll booths, therefore the congestion that they cause would disappear.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
